titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Campbell Christian Neighborhood House was a center for Christian education, Americanization and social service in Campbell, Ohio.

scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised of Trustees minutes, correspondence, financial reports, and related records, 1924-1947. Minutes include the constitution, annual reports, treasurer's reports, and a report and history on the activities of the House, with recommendations for future changes to programs. The collection also includes correspondence and legal documents relating to the transfer of the House to the care of the Baptist Association of Trumbull County. Also included is the deed for the House and a 1944 audit.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
